channel.title: Ofertas Diarias de Audio Plugin Guy (2025-10-31)
channel.description: Resumen de las mejores ofertas y freebies del d?a 2025-10-31.

item.title: [HUGE SAVINGS] 80% OFF for CLARITY EQ by Camp David Studios via Pluginomat
item.description: Descuento: 80% - Desarrollador: Camp David Studio - Finaliza: 2025-11-12

item.title: [FREEBIE] Ghosthack has released Free Halloween Horror Sound FX pack
[HUGE SAVINGS] Get 90% off UAD Studio Classics Bundle by Universal Audio. The discounted price is $59
[HUGE SAVINGS] Get 86% off Rewind by MeldaProduction. The discounted price is $9
[FREEBIE] E-instruments has released Slower Fragment, a free library for Kontakt Player
[FREEBIE] Kilohearts has released Preset Sematary, a free content bank for Phase Plant virtual synth in celebration of Halloween
[FREEBIE] Rhodes & UJAM are offering Usynth DELUXE by UJAM as a free download
[FREEBIE] Solid State Logic has released SSL 360? V2.0, a command centre for 360?-enabled plugins and integration software application. The core SSL 360? Plugin Mixer software is free
item.description: Descuento: 100% - Desarrollador: Solid State Logic - Finaliza: None

item.title: [HUGE SAVINGS] Nembrini Audio Halloween Sale – build your custom 2-plugin bundle for $29.99 (up to 89% off)
[HUGE SAVINGS] PLUGINOMAT – 86% OFF for BEASTVERB by Beastsamples
[HUGE SAVINGS] PLUGINOMAT – 89% OFF for COLORFUL BUNDLE by Vicious Antelope
[HUGE SAVINGS] PLUGINOMAT – 82% OFF for CYBER TOOLZ by Sick Noise Instruments
item.description: Descuento: 82% - Desarrollador: Sick Noise Instruments - Finaliza: 2025-11-12

item.title: [HUGE SAVINGS] PLUGINOMAT – 85% OFF for DIVINE RESONANCES by Golden Screw Studio

item.title: [FREEBIE] UJAM & Rhodes are offering Rhodes V-PAN plugin as a free download. Simply sign up for the Rhodes newsletter and you will receive the instructions how to get the plugin for free
[HUGE SAVINGS] Solid State Logic Halloween Sale – 90% off on SSL Native FlexVerb plugin for Mac & Win. Use the code: TRICK
item.description: Descuento: 90% - Desarrollador: Solid State Logic - Finaliza: 2025-11-01

item.title: [HUGE SAVINGS] MeldaProduction has released Rewind, a virtual instrument expansion for MSoundFactory or the free MSoundFactoryPlayer. The intro is 87% off
[HUGE SAVINGS] Solid State Logic Halloween Sale – 80% off on SSL X-Limit plugin for Mac & Win. Use the code: TREAT
item.description: Descuento: 80% - Desarrollador: Solid State Logic - Finaliza: 2025-11-01

item.title: [FREEBIE] Aurora DSP has released Nosferatu, a free high-gain preamp plugin from beyond the grave for Win & Mac
item.description: Descuento: 100% - Desarrollador: Aurora DSP - Finaliza: None

item.title: [HUGE SAVINGS] AYAIC Software Halloween Sale – up to 85% off on plugins, bundles and pre-orders
